entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:59 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 06:05 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: E 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow or rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:31 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow or rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:31 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
